name: Count GitHub events in small dataset

content.query: select count(*) from openrowset(bulk 'https://bittrancedatalakedemo.dfs.core.windows.net/big-data/small-set/', format = 'csv', fieldterminator ='0x0b', fieldquote = '0x0b', rowterminator = '0x0a' ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows cross apply openjson(doc, '$') with ("id" varchar(20))
